subsubsection.title: SKILLS
subsubsection.p:
Practice each skill in the exercises listed.
Simplify radicals: 16
Simplify products and quotients of radcials: 710
Combine like radicals: 1118
Multiply radical expressions: 1936
Rationalize the denominator: 3750
Simplify \sqrt[n]{a^n} : 5154
Solve radical equations: 5580
